meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>prune</kanji> and <kanji>take</kanji> from what you pruned, you're going <vocabulary>to mow</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to reap</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to harvest</vocabulary> whatever it is you're pruning.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the reading you learned with 刈 and the reading from the vocab 取る.
